text: Garry Rumbles is a British chemist and researcher at CU-Boulder. He is a fellow of the Royal Society of Chemistry and has written more than 130 journal articles. He has an h-index of 59. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:University of Colorado Boulder faculty Category:Fellows of the Royal Society of Chemistry Category:21st-century American chemists
title: Garry Rumbles
